question: I was wondering if any of my health problems would cause what I have recently heard of..."heavy leg syndrome"...I am A-fib, had congestive heart failure, I have diabetes, edima, and seizure disorder...my diabetes, seizure disorder, and high blood pressure are all under control with medication...please let me know if you can, could any of these medical problems cause my legs to be heavy to where I have trouble raising them to get into a car?....Thanks, in advance, for your reply!!
title: [no subject]
